website_summaries.verdict: A long-time favorite Versace scent that remains popular today, and one that won't overly stretch your budget. Hands down the best value by the fashion-forward brand.
pros: Ultra-feminine fragrance that boasts a sensual combination of floral top notes accompanied by vanilla, musk, and hint of spice for a well-rounded scent
Comes at a lower price than other Versace perfumes
cons: The bottle has arrived damaged in a few cases
If you don't like scents that lean on the sweet side, it may not appeal to you

customer_reviews.title: Fake Ass Perfume
customer_reviews.text: This isn't Versace Red Jean's. I've been buying this perfume for almost 20 years and this isn't it. This is a fake. I would really appreciate a real bottle with the actual perfume in it, not a knock off that smells nothing like the original.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell like the original.
customer_reviews.text: This smells awful. This scent was my favorite but it is difficult to find. This smells of alcohol and synthetic peach, like cheap hand sanitizer or disinfectant. The scent quickly quickly fades into nothing. I hate to say it but it doesn't seem to be authentic. I'm so appalled, I really want a refund. Save your money. I wish I could give it zero stars. Highly upset!
customer_reviews.author: Tru

customer_reviews.title: Delightful, long lasting fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fragrance. The first spray has an off smell. Once it mixes with your body chemistry, it is heavenly. My husband says its delicious. Worth your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective Item
customer_reviews.text: After my fiance opened her gift (4/10/18) that I ordered, she a first wasn't able to use it. Something within the pump spraying mechanism isn't working correctly. When she pushes down on the pump button in order to dispense perfume it barely comes out. When it does however it smells nice. The bottom line is she's not able to enjoy her gift because it's not working affectively and what good is an item when you can't enjoy it? I feel a new one should be in order. One that works
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff

customer_reviews.title: I get compliments whenever I wear it
customer_reviews.text: Is is really a great scent when you are sitting at a conference table and a male co worker leans over and asks what you are wearing because it smells good. The key is finding the right scent for you. Not what you think smells good in a bottle. I hope they never quit making this scent. It is the only one for me! You don't have to spend a fortune on cologne. I recommend you try it... Wish you could find it in the store so people could test it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Million

product_meta.title: Versace Red Jeans for Women Eau De Toilette Spray, 2.5 Ounce
product_meta.description: Launched by the design house of Gianni Versace in 1994, RED JEANS is classified as a sharp, floral fragrance. This feminine scent possesses a blend of jasmine, vanilla, musk, sandalwood and lily. It is recommended for casual wear.
feature_bullets: Top notes are peach, apricot, freesia, blackcurrant
In the heart note, lily-of-the-valley, violet, water lily and rose
The base is composed of sandalwood, musk and vanilla
